newsitem.title: USA: Merry Land completes notes offering.
newsitem.headline: Merry Land completes notes offering.

text.p: Merry Land & Investment Co Inc said Thursday that it has completed an offering of $50 million of senior unsecured notes.

The notes will bear interest at 6.90 percent payable semi-annually on February 1 and August 1 and will mature August 1, 2007. The notes are rated BBB+ by Standard & Poor's, BBB+ by Duff & Phelps and Baa2 by Moody's Investor Service. The notes were priced at 99.707 percent of par value to yield 6.941 percent to maturity.
The company said it intends to use the net proceeds to purchase and develop additional apartment properties.
Merry Land is an apartment-operating company.
